prompts: Create a powerful sound-based Pokemon that can unleash sonic waves.
Show me a unique Pokemon with large ears and a loud voice.
Design a quirky Pokemon that thrives in urban environments and loves music.
Imagine a Pokemon that uses sound to communicate and can confuse its opponents.
Generate a jovial creature that emits vibrations and enjoys lively gatherings.
Give me a Pokemon with a round, robust body and playful personality.
Make a loud Pokemon that can be found in caves or near concert venues.
